title: Blood Moon champ select issue play issue
body: When I queue for the blood moon game mode, a friend selected a champion but did not lock. We were booted for abandoning during champ select. It happened twice. I know that he is selected on the champion, as we are in the same room. Thanks in advance for any help.

replies.body: i just had this happen to me, i was camille, and everyone else picked but 1 guy, and we all got blocked for 6 minutes.....
Yes, you need to lock in.
